A

activateEvent() - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ProcessEvent
Informs the observers about the activation of the event.
activateEvent(String) - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ProcessEvent
Conditionally activates the event, whether the string passed by argument matches it's regular expression.
actualStatus - Variable in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Represents the status of the process at the moment of the observation.
addEvent(ProcessEvent) - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Adds a new event to the process that could be activated during the process execution.

C

cmd - Variable in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Contains the command associated with the process.
com.marcosgarciacasado.pem - package com.marcosgarciacasado.pem
Provides the classes necessary to launch a process and activate observer events when the stdout of the process launched matches a specific regular expression.

E

eventList - Variable in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Contains a list of events that can be launched during the execution of the process whether a line returned by the standard output matches a specific regular expression which activates it.
eventMatchesLine(String) - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Passes the line given by argument through every event registered in the process so that it activates when the line matches it's regular expression.

getStatus() - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ProcessEvent

M

matches(String) - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ProcessEvent

O

ObservableProcess - Class in com.marcosgarciacasado.pem
Manages the execution of a process through command line and reads its standard output stream to launch events when it matches with an specific regular expression.
ObservableProcess() - Constructor for class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Basic constructor.
ObservableProcess(String) - Constructor for class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Constructor of the process defined by the command passed by argument.

P

ProcessStatus - Interface in com.marcosgarciacasado.pem

R

removeEvent(ProcessEvent) - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
If it has been inserted before, removes the event passed by argument from the list of events that the process manages.
resetStatus() - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Establishes the status of the process to an Initial Status.
runProcess() - Method in class com.marcosgarciacasado.pem.ObservableProcess
Launches the process and analyzes line by line its output to check the events.
